description:
Yukimura`s sister loves playing princess but her brother`s not princely enough. She`s smitten by Prince Usui, so Yukimura arranges a date for them to regain her favor.
Source: HIDIVE

titles.title: Fukukaichou wa Ouji-sama? / Aoi to Yukai na Nakama-tachi
The Vice President Is a Prince?! Aoi & Her Fun Companions
نائب الرئيسة أمير؟! / آوي والأصدقاء السعداء
副会長は王子様!? / AOIとユカイな仲間たち
